featured.text: There, time almost stands still, and horse-drawn carts outnumber motor vehicles.
Some regions prepare horses made of cucumbers and cows made of eggplants, hoping that the spirits will come back to Earth quickly, on a horse, and leave slowly, riding the cow.
He demanded that his kidnappers play tiring games with him, such as riding Bill as a horse for nine miles.

definition.zh_def: 馬：一種大型的四足動物，通常用於騎乘、工作或比賽。
definition.en_def: A horse is a large, four-legged animal commonly used for riding, work, or racing.
definition.example: She rode her horse along the beach at sunset.
